vote.title: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for the purchase of sod and installation for citywide use - Blue Sky Sod Farm, LLC in the estimated amount of $1,369,859.00 and Sports Field Holdings, LLC dba Sports Field Solutions in the estimated amount of $342,471.00, lowest responsible bidders of two - Total estimated amount of $1,712,330.00 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,523,973.70) and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($188,356.30)
vote.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for the purchase of sod and installation for citywide use - Blue Sky Sod Farm, LLC in the estimated amount of $1,369,859.00 and Sports Field Holdings, LLC dba Sports Field Solutions in the estimated amount of $342,471.00, lowest responsible bidders of two - Total estimated amount of $1,712,330.00 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,523,973.70) and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($188,356.30)
